rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a decorative facade, integrated with sustainable materials such as bamboo and recycled wood, ensuring ample daylighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan living room that connects to the central courtyard for natural ventilation and light. Incorporates passive solar design principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact, energy-efficient kitchen with proper ventilation and water-saving fixtures. Uses local stone finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A modest guest bathroom with eco-friendly fixtures and efficient water usage, located near the living area for convenience.

openings.description: Spacious balcony designed to maximize natural light and ventilation while offering outdoor space for relaxation.
A large opening leading from the living area into a central courtyard that promotes passive cooling and enhances spatial quality according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A well-ventilated, spacious bedroom with an attached balcony following eco-friendly practices and ensuring proper orientation for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Sleek design with ample natural lighting; includes a private balcony per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom featuring eco-friendly construction materials and a dedicated balcony for air circulation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom with sustainable features, providing both functionality and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Work Room
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed for optimum concentration, ensuring proper orientation and lighting in line with eco-design principles.

openings.description: Each bedroom features a balcony that provides direct access to the outdoors for enhanced natural ventilation.
A well-designed staircase facilitating easy movement, with emphasis on safety and energy-efficient lighting.
